response.name: 400 signup

item.name: Users

request.description:
The api serve 2 purpose

1. Get all users using pagination
2. Get users who match a criteria with pagination
Get a user by their id

Update a users:

1. firstname
2. lastname
    

Every other field is immutable once created.

item.description:
Folder for viewing users based on any of the following criteria

1. user id
2. firstname
3. lastname
4. username
5. view all users

item.name: Connections

request.description: Find a connection by the connection id

response.name: 400 by id

request.description:
The api serve 2 purpose

1. Get all connections using pagination
2. Get connections which match a criteria with pagination

item.description: A user can only start sending messages when two users are connected.

item.name: Message

request.description: ## Get A Message By Message Id.

## Get All Messages And Filter Messages By Any Field.

The api makes it possible to get all messages using pagination and also filter the messages based on any of the message schema field.

The api serve 2 purpose

1. Get all messages using pagination
2. Get messages that match a criteria with pagination
